mapper.insert: insert into logback_config (id, directoryName, environment, enable, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{directoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{environment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, directoryName, environment, enable, create_time from logback_config
